DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this post market clinical follow-up (PMCF) investigation is to evaluate performance and safety of Exufiber when used as intended in Stage II-IV pressure ulcers (PU).
DOC.brief_title: Post Market Clinical Follow-up Investigation to Evaluate Performance and Safety on Pressure Ulcers, PU, When Using Exufiber as Intended
